overview: Re-percussions: An African Odyssey is the return of the Trinidad  and Tobago steelpan to its African roots. As Nigerian panman Bowie  Sonnie Bowei attempts to nurture a steelband movement in Africa,  he has to confront the challenge of propagating a creation of the  descendants of enslaved people in a complex society, with its own  percussive traditions.
title: Repercussions: An African Odyssey
